alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:19PM EDT until July 18 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hamilton County in southwestern Ohio... Southeastern Butler County in southwestern Ohio... Northern Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Warren County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 519 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Highpoint, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Middletown, Fairfield, Mason, Lebanon, Sharonville, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Springdale, Montgomery, West Chester, Morrow, Kings Island, Sixteen Mile Stand, Olde West Chester, Four Bridges, Highpoint, Remington, Wetherington and Brecon. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 16 and 31. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 16 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
